data.title: Boom expected in Sino-Thai exchanges
data.description: Cultural communication and people-to-people exchanges between China and Thailand will see a boom next year when the two countries celebrate their 50th anniversary of diplomatic relations, officials from both sides said at a forum in Bangkok on Monday.

data.title: Muhammad most popular boys’ baby name in England
data.description: LONDON - Muhammad was the most popular name given to baby boys in England and Wales in 2023, ousting Noah to take the top spot, official figures showed on Thursday.
